title: Windows 10 upgrade
body: I was forced to upgrade to windows 10 and now the pvp.net keeps failing. I know almost nothing about computers. I just want it to work. What do I do?

replies.body:
I should definitely be able to help you out with that.  But first I just need a bit more info:  When you say that it keeps failing, what kind of error message do you get exactly?  What does it specifically say?

Reply back and let me know!
